website_summaries.verdict: Safe for the dishwasher, the boards have a durable border to keep them in place while you're chopping away.
pros: Comes with three sizes to accommodate various foods
Affordable 3-set (small, medium and large) chopping boards that wash well in the dishwasher
Boards have easy grip and avoid slippage
Extremely easy to clean and easy to store in kitchen
cons: Only comes in white and may stain easily

customer_reviews.title: Wow, so awful, plastic in my food? They are aware and do not care. No, going back to Pampered Chef
customer_reviews.text: This was only after using for 3 days. DEEP knife cuts, hard to clean food out of the knife cuts. Plastic shedding into my food. throwing these out!! Going back to pampered chef as I have a board that is over 10 yrs old that needed to be replaced. I cook almost everyday and being vegetarian I chop a LOT of veges!! The good ratings have to be bogus! Nope, no attempts to improve, just look at the 1 star ratings and pictures- they are aware and do not care. Looks like many are having this problem and they are choosing not to fix it!! Look back as this has been a complaint since December of 2016!!
customer_reviews.author: S. Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me!
customer_reviews.text: I hate to write bad reviews, but these cutting boards simply did not meet my expectations. I do not know if they were a bit warped or what , but they slid all over the granite countertop when I tried to use them. I expected the handle part to grip the countertop, but they didn't. I should have sent them back, but somehow the hassle of doing that seemed like more work that it was worth. I would not recommend purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: mn

customer_reviews.title: Leaves deep cut marks on board...unacceptable
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with these cutting boards. They are not hard as described. When using a sharp knife, it cuts big ridges in the cutting board where bacteria can gather. I would really like my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for any cook!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these cutting boards. They are very durable and handy. The plastic is less porous than a lot of cheaper cutting boards which makes for a smoother surface which is less harsh on my knives. The biggest bonus is the non-slip edges that keep it safely in place. The graduated sizes are also very convienient, and they all fit nicely in the dishwasher. I will be ordering another set for my boyfriend since he likes mine so much. Highly recommend these for any one that does much work in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Very functional and they do not warp or mis-shape in the dishwasher!
customer_reviews.text: The best part about these is that they have yet to melt or deform in the dishwasher, and I use them A LOT! I have had them for maybe 6 months and use them regularly, washing them in a high end Bosch dishwasher - no deformity on the bottom rack. The anti skid aspects are not super functional as the sides really need to be anti-skid, not just the ends. They are great for cutting on the counter or transporting meats from the kitchen to the grill. You wont be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: the guru

customer_reviews.title: A MUST OWN!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so surprised to see this set of 3 for sale at such a reasonable cost and wanted to have a set instead of so many odd shaped worn out cutting boards taking up space in a small kitchen. WOWW was I shocked to get such a lovely set..., easy to wash and store and one I leave out to use as a little butler in kitchen counter to put a bowl on top with fruits...makes such a cute stand and right there to grab when needed. I think everyone should own these and I am super pleased over price, quality and shipping delivery...couldn't be a happier customer and would give it 10 stars if I could :-)
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Wolk

customer_reviews.title: Gorilla SLIP
customer_reviews.text: These so absolutely NOT have a gorilla grip on your counter. They slip all over the place. The bottom does not have any "feet" or other rubbery part extending beyond flush with the hard bottom of the cutting surface. Therefor they slip and move -- the very thing I thought I was avoiding by buying a product called "Gorilla Grip".
customer_reviews.author: John Dutoit

customer_reviews.title: More OEM Amazon Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations for these from the reviews but turns out they are more repackaged cheap Chinese garbage. No labels on the actual boards, super generic, rubber sides don't even come in contact with the counter because the plastic is Concaved! it is hilarious. All three slide around like hockey pucks unless they would be used upside down with no drip tray. Will be returning. Waste of time & money.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Product Review

customer_reviews.title: Good for cutting things with knives and such...
customer_reviews.text: ...without marring your counter tops. You know, precisely what they're designed for. I primarily use the largest size for preparing vegetables for juicing. But they're sturdy, look good, and resist stains. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DLJ

customer_reviews.title: Poor, almost non-existent grip. Good thickness, and juice drips.
customer_reviews.text: Nice size cutting board, and the juice drips are very helpful! But, for $20 I was expecting the cutting boards to be able to grip my linoleum table. Instead, it's sliding around like a hockey puck. I cleaned my surface, and the back of the cutting board, but if anything that just made it slide even easier. This is highly disappointing! One of the points of advertising was that the board had great grip, and one of the reasons I got it in the first place was because my previous board was slipping too much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does Scratch Easily
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Pack of three in convenient sizes. Grips to the countertop nicely and doesn’t slide. Love the edge to catch liquids. Cons: Does show knife scratches pretty easily, although that’s what will happen to plastic cutting boards. Overall, I am really happy with the cutting boards and do recommend despite the scratching. Glass or a composite material would be recommended to avoid scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something that "really" didn't slide off the counter, and these are it. I love the three pack for size variety. 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Slacker

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I really liked how they looked and thought I'd enjoy using them in my new kitchen. Loved that they came in different sizes. Unfortunately, they aren't as strong as I hoped. Was chopping meat and this happened. The board broke! Have hardly had 3 months of use with these. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nma

customer_reviews.title: I Wouldn’t Buy Them Again
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I can’t really recommend these cutting boards. I have much older boards that are in a lot better condition than these are after only a few uses. Every knife cut slices into the plastic, and you end up with a board that looks like it was the victim of a slasher film.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: finally got rid of my old sketchy cutting board I've used for years. These were a great replacement. I enjoy having different sizes for different things. The liquid catch basin is perfect for cleaning up. no slip on counter too
customer_reviews.author: David Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and value. These cutting boards are all a very useful size and weight. Very easy to clean and have not noticed any stains or knife marks. I have used the large one to poundout meats and poultry with no damage to the cutting board. I bought the black rimmed ones with a nice drip well on the side. Purchased for functionality and not for color. Very functional and of high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with
customer_reviews.text: The largest board does grip the counter and not slide so 1 of 3 is good. However, whatever process they used to package the other 2 is terrible. The 2 smaller boards are warped just enough so the rubber does not grip the counter, the main reason I bought this set. 2 of 3 are like Gorillas on a ice rink.
customer_reviews.author: So, Um, Pen Name Stuff

customer_reviews.title: So Happy With These Boards!
customer_reviews.text: We are so pleased with these cutting boards. I'm kicking myself for not replacing our old boards sooner. They are lighter in weight than our old ones - not nearly so much manual labor required to move them around the kitchen. There is always a size that is right for the cutting job at hand. And, they're easy to clean after you use them. The surface is so smooth everything washes right off. We've only had ours for a short time but they get used 2-3 times daily and so far our knives are not leaving any cutting marks on the boards. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Carole

customer_reviews.title: amazing cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 8 cutting boards in the last year trying to find ones I actually like. A lot of them would get sliced into and break down in the dishwasher when I tried to clean them even though they were dishwasher safe. This cutting board is perfect and i have no complaints. doesnt move when cutting, feel heavy duty like a good product and comes out of the dishwasher perfectly. I have already recommended these to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Defrain

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I was using those flimsy cutting boards for way too long! I needed something more durable. As long as your countertop is clean and the bottom of the board is wiped off, it doesn't move around. As with anything you use sharp objects on, it will leave cut marks but cleans off easy regardless of the wear on the surface. I like that it comes with several sizes!
customer_reviews.author: JacobO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome cutting boards! Great quality, the ridge along the outside to catch liquids is fantastic and so is the handle on the end to hold onto as you slide what you cut into a bowl or pan. They are really durable and hold up well in the dishwasher. You can't go wrong with these!
customer_reviews.author: hilary41

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Gorilla Grips do not grip as promised. Like most cutting boards these boards slip on the counter and do not state that they are dishwasher safe. This was very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: High Desert Lady

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cutting board set. They're well made, durable, easy to clean, and the non-slip grips are a great addition. The best deal I've seen for the price. Great value!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The perfect cutting board!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I cook a lot! These cutting boards are a great addition to your kitchen tools. I smoke a lot of beef, pork, and chicken. The juice grooves are convenient, helping me to keep from spilling juice when slicing meat. My wife appreciates the various sizes depending on whatever she is choosing to cut up for the next meal. These cutting boards are easy to clean by hand and they clean up well in the dishwasher as well. Well priced, excellent quality, and I will purchase again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Good plastic cutting boards.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to clean, but it already has a lot of cuts from using it for 2 months. It's plastic so I don't expect much more and still give it 5 stars. The sizes are all convenient especially when you're cutting different things a dont want to mix flavors.
customer_reviews.author: travisbe

customer_reviews.title: Good size and durable.  Use in dishwasher with heat drying and ok!
customer_reviews.text: Used in dishwasher with heat drying a lot and am not gentle on these. Good sizes as well and good price. Happy with purchase. No issues with melting or other problems. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John F

customer_reviews.title: Good cutting board.
customer_reviews.text: I was using the thin plastic cutting boards for awhile and they started to get really thin so I bought these. Me and my girlfriend cook often and are happy with them and they look like they will last a long time. Not much to say which is probably a good thing for a product that has such a simple purpose.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Overdue purchase
customer_reviews.text: Having been using the same wooden cutting board for years, enduring broken sections, difficulty cleaning, I finally gave in and purchased this cutting board set. As soon as the set arrived and immediately after washing, I used the boards to cut vegetables for shishkabobs. It was if I was living a dream; I had forgotten how nice it is to use well-designed, quality tools that are made for the job. The three sizes are nice, but honestly, any of them alone would have been enough to be a major upgrade for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, boards are stained and impossible to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like these cutting boards. I use them about 3 times a week. But after only 6 months of use they have noticeable cuts in them, are stained, and impossible to keep clean. Our last set lasted for years. Maybe it's a quality control issue because GorillaGrip products are usually well made.
customer_reviews.author: NBMom

customer_reviews.title: Slide all over the counter
customer_reviews.text: I bought them because they say they are non slip. They slide everywhere. Not as bad as a standard cutting board but it’s definitely not non slip. The grips are tiny little strips near the handle ONLY that are as thick as a marker line. They still slide everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: We love these cutting boards. They are very durable and handy. The fact that you get 3 is amazing. Perfect to separate the items needing to be cut, i.e. meat on one, vegetables on another. The plastic is not porus at all and after using them with tomatoes, peppers and sun-dried tomatoes, they are as white as when they came. There are some markings from the knives which certainly is expected, however they are definitely not 'gouges' and don't effect the use of the cutting board. They are easy to grip and the fact that they 'stay put' when cutting is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Slidin'
customer_reviews.text: Bought these after getting tired of my old cutting boards sliding all over the counter. Not only do these slide just as bad, they already have cuts in them after the first use. I have an older cutting board from a different company that's lasted years with barely a scratch. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hickey

customer_reviews.title: Not nonslip at all.
customer_reviews.text: These work for the sake of them being cutting boards, but it says they are supposed to be nonslip, they are as far from nonslip as you can get. I usually have to put something under them to hold them in place. I wouldn’t recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: adam_p

customer_reviews.title: I really like these strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: I really like these strong and durable. I love that they have a 3 pack for various applications. My other one warped which is why we got these but from the construction of these I dont think they will.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: very prone to cut marks. Only had it for a couple weeks and I'm thinking if I use it any longer the cuts will soon chop off bits of small plastic into our food. Will look for some durable glass cutting board instead
customer_reviews.author: TZ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Convenience
customer_reviews.text: Great but live the assorted sizes for different jobs while working I. The kitchen. Makes a terrific gift at a very affordable price. Made well, sturdy non slip surface and so easy to clean by using soap and water. No cut marks no staining. Use larger one across top of sink, medium size by drain board when cooking and smaller one at dinner table when serving bread, cheese with meal. Purchased B&W but have beautiful selection of colors for any decor. Well made a must have for any kitchen and those who love to cook great convenience at an unbeatable price. Can't go wrong with these.
customer_reviews.author: Stargazer

customer_reviews.title: Did not grip counter.
customer_reviews.text: Returned product the next day. They did not grip the counter. I had to hold them down and cut. The rubber was not thick enough. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jill J Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give these boards a better score, I was so excited when they came out of the package. But my excitement ended there. After the first use they had deep cut marks and wouldn’t come clean, as you can see from the photos. I had bought them for an event I had to cater and had no choice but to use them for the weekend - I’m highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Life in the Raw

customer_reviews.title: They slide all over the place
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this on Christmas Day 2017. They seemed nice, sturdy and as expected but, they really don't work as expected. I wanted to be able to use these without the need for a wet towel between the counter and the board to prevent sliding, well they don't work. I've tried everything even bending them on the edge of the counter so the silicone grips touch the counter. No luck. I still use them, but I remain disappointed in the fact they slide and I still have to anchor them down with a wet towel. Buy again? No Recommend? No Two stars because they are well built and I can use them, but not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: GringoDave

customer_reviews.title: Stay away!
customer_reviews.text: Only one star... too hard is like cutting directly onto a granite surface. Also, the rubber edges are useless, they do not touch the surface and thus the board keep sliding all over my kitchen counter.... Bad purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge B.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY, SPLINTERS AFTER FIRST USE
customer_reviews.text: After first use the board was splintering and fragments of the board were peeling off and getting in my food, DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lisenby

customer_reviews.title: Love these cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product at such a great price. Would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Quesenberry

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Stained and got deep knicks in them after ONE use. Guess I'm going back to wood.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin G

customer_reviews.title: Scratch and cut really easily
customer_reviews.text: Had cuts from the first time I used them. Wish I could find some like the old one on my counter. Clear opaque plastic or resin... and very hard never a scratch. I wasnt thrilled with the shape of these but you cant hardly find the paddle shaped now. I feel like all those cuts hold bacteria. I know what I want can be made, wish I could still find it. ; ( . I will say the the trench around the outside is nice when cutting juicy things like oranges.
customer_reviews.author: Politically what?

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in these cutting boards! I have a set of cheapo IKEA ones that I have used for probably 15 years. After that long, the knife marks became so discolored I decided it was time to get a new set. These were so highly rated on Amazon I just assumed they would be great. But after just a few uses, they’re full of all kinds of cut marks that are completely discolored. I cannot get the discoloration out via dishwasher or hand washing. Super disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Carla O.

customer_reviews.title: Great set of Cutting Boards
customer_reviews.text: These cutting boards are fantastic. I like the fact that when you are slicing something such as meat, even though my knives are very sharp, the boards hold up and do not get knife gouges in them like some others I have had in the past. The reason for the 4 stars instead of 5 is the so called non-slip claim. I have a granite counter and unfortunately, the rubber on these are durable but not something that stops the board from sliding. This was my main reason of buying these. Just the same though, I do love them and use them more than my other cutting boards now.
customer_reviews.author: cdub

customer_reviews.title: Great Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of cutting boards! Exactly what I was looking for. The drip catch is AMAZING - it's the first time I've ever had a cutting board with is and it's life change aha. They are heavy duty and great sizes. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Good cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly what I needed. I like that I can pop these in the dishwasher to cleanse Wi-Fi no worries. I also like that they come as a set of 3 different sizes for all my needs. The largest one is what I use the most, so it already has some knife indentations, but it’s not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: AMM

customer_reviews.title: This is a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these cutting boards! The rubberized bottom holds them in placed when used. Have used them multiple times with good, sharp knives and the surfaces look like they are withstanding the blades. The 3 sizes are nice! You can pick the size you need.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Murren

customer_reviews.title: Non slip
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t slide around when cutting plus the groves to catch the juices is nice so less to clean up
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The large board is non-skid, but the other 2 are useless as they skid around.
customer_reviews.text: Only 1 of 3 boards is usable. The 2 smaller ones slide around on the counter. They are of no use to me. If you have ones that are non-skid, like the large one, I'd like for you to replace the ones I received with usable ones. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good for chopping at all
customer_reviews.text: Used once for chopping some ribs and a bunch of the plastic came off and was embedded into the ribs. Had to pick plastic out of the food. To be fair this is advertised as a cutting board not a chopping board but didn't think it would break off so easily into the food.
customer_reviews.author: Ray from Wash DC

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These have gotten deep gouges and stains from normal use. I dont feel safe using them since the gouges can harbor bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Alec J. Brooks

customer_reviews.title: This item grips very poorly
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 cutting boards and wanted more. I could not send this item back fast enough. While I cannot comment on the cutting durability specifically, this product was unstable as far as grip of the table was concerned. I may look up Dexas, the manufacturer of my current, old and extremely sturdy and superior gripping cutting boards, or OXO, whose products have always been of high quality and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Do not last long
customer_reviews.text: When I purchase a product I prefer that it lasts a long time. 1 year for a cutting board to be excessively stained and unable to be revived is a poor product. I would not recommend on purchasing these. Disappointed after all the great ratings.
customer_reviews.author: N. Pelletier

customer_reviews.title: Move on!
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package and these “gorilla grip” cutting boards slid across my counter as if they were on sheets of ice. Take the risk if you want; I promptly sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Levine

customer_reviews.title: Nowhere on package does it state that it's bpa free
customer_reviews.text: I have to wonder if it's truly bpa free like their Amazon title suggests. Nowhere on the packaging does it state that it's bpa free. That's a big deal to many people these days. If it really is bpa free, why not make it known on the packaging. It's from China so it is highly suspect that it really is. Seems sturdy and efficient. Would have rated 5 stars except for bpa issue
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Exactly as described. Bought these to replace old, cheap cutting boards we had. These were worth it. Washes well in dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: LorraineTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Not Oversized at all
customer_reviews.text: The title says “oversized” but even the largest one in the pack of 3 is far smaller than my big cutting board I already have. I should have looked at the details and checked for measurements. They looked like great cutting boards and I Am in need of non slip ones but I returned these because like I said, even the largest one I wouldn’t be able to prepare 1lb of meat on. Too small.
customer_reviews.author: Stephenie F.

customer_reviews.title: Warped. Not safe!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. Two of the three were warped so they slide all over the place and the one that was flat still was not stable. You need a sturdy, fixed cutting surface and these slipping all over the place are a hazard.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Sommerville

customer_reviews.title: Some nice features but easy to leave cutting marks
customer_reviews.text: Liked: Easy to handle, solid feel, heft, looks clean from dishwasher (so far), design, price. Not liked: Cutting surface shows marks left by knife. Even light pressure on knife leaves mark. Frequent use will deepen marks, creating food residue, will require constant deep washing for safe food preparation. Without this flaw cutting boards would have earned 5 stars all-around. Maybe boards are not intended for long term use.
customer_reviews.author: MMS

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Others that have mentioned huge gashes on reviews are obviously cutting into the board or with too much force. They are not perfect in that you won’t see some marks but wouldn’t go so far as to indicate gashes. We have used for several weeks and are extremely happy with them. If you want a great cutting board, that are dishwasher safe, durable and are not crazy expensive these are a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Campbell

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of money - see photo (after the first wash in the dishwasher)
customer_reviews.text: Cracked after ONE wash cycle in the dishwasher. Do I need to say anymore?
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to clean up!
customer_reviews.text: Not going to lie, I did not like these when we first got them. It was too slick and the food slipped all over. Fast forward a little while with almost daily use, it’s my go to for cutting boards. We have NICE wooden expensive cutting boards, but these clean up easily (dishwasher), they’re small, they’re light, they’re just great all around! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: William's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Slides everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mom because it said it had a gorilla glue grip but they literally slide around all over.
customer_reviews.author: T shaner

customer_reviews.title: Scoring evidence after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: After 3 uses or cutting fruit, the board is scored. The durability is not holding up as expected.
customer_reviews.author: ErnRH

customer_reviews.title: Great boards
customer_reviews.text: 3 perfectly sized boards. Small is not so small you can't use it, large isn't so large it is unwieldy and the medium is perfect for just about any kitchen job. Rubbery ends keep the boards in place during rigorous slicing. Easy clean and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Werth

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!!! Do Not Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: My knife cut right through the plastic on my first attempt at slicing some tomatoes, and chips of plastic got mixed in with my food. DO NOT BUY! I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Soroosh

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but...
customer_reviews.text: Nice sizes but not as weighty as expected.Tend to slip around on counter top a bit so advise take care while chopping. Thought "gorilla"would grip better. Got these to replace another multicolored set of similar material that had seen better days however holding on to old set since never had a slipping issue and not as pretty but can still be used. Would not reorder this product.
customer_reviews.author: LJB

customer_reviews.title: Awful cutting Boards...do not buy
customer_reviews.text: These are the flimsiest non-skid cutting boards ever. Very cheaply made...used today for the very first time to slice tomatoes and there are scratches all over them from cutting...for goodness sake they are CUTTING BOARDS!!! Full of cuts and I've only used 1 time! Just awful...they slide all over and are not worth the money. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Lee W.

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY BUILT DISHWASHER SAFE CUTTING BOARD SET
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set of 3 dishwasher safe cutting boards to replace some that were over 10 years old. These are equally nice, very well built and might even last longer than the brand that lasted 10 years.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Southam

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through so many cutting boards over the years, but not any more. These are THE BEST cutting boards I've ever used! They are very durable, easy to keep clean and are very well made. I will be buying another set soon!
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Price!
customer_reviews.text: We love these cutting boards! They are sturdy and affordable and can go in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: mastermom

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. Plastic is to soft. Normal cutting of vegetables carving chicken breast the knife leaves cut marks so deep you will never get them clean. Food is trapped in these cut marks.
customer_reviews.author: luvbooks

customer_reviews.title: No Grip
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately these cutting boards do not grip my granite countertop but just slide all over. I loved the idea that they were wider and came in three different sizes but so disappointed that they did not function as was described. Returned them and will continue looking.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Work great and dishwasher safe!
customer_reviews.text: This things are awesome! I can throw them in the dishwasher and the sizes accommodate whatever I'm cooking. The ring around the board is great for catching juices when cutting something like tomatoes. These beat the hassle and possible food contamination of having a traditional wooden block.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Knives slice the board....
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this would do, to replace a plastic one I’d used for fifteen years. It didn’t. First use, I cut 3 hotdogs into small chunks. Look at th cuts in the board!!! This shouldn’t happen!
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and holds up well. I really like that I can put it in the dishwasher and the sizes are great for what you choose to chop. I’ve had it for about a month now and it still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: jnguyen

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Dish washer safe so it’s very easy to clean and decent sizing that fits in any washer. Only downside is how easily the boards get damaged by knives... I’ve had these boards about a month or two, and already have significant cuts/indentation caused by cutting veggies and meat. These “slits”, for lack of a better term, cause food (and potentially bacteria) to get stuck within them which does make it a bit more difficult to keep clean, but generally speaking this is a great product especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mya

customer_reviews.title: Gripless
customer_reviews.text: This may be my fault for not studying up enough on the anatomy of gorillas? Are gorillas know for their grip or lack there of? I assumed when you name something "gorilla grip", it meant that it would be a strong, non slip grip. Nope, quite the opposite. I've honestly never used a cutting board that slips around on the counter as much as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Blanchat

customer_reviews.title: These are not scratch resistant
customer_reviews.text: i was really surprised that these were so susceptible to cuts by a knife. i used one of these cutting boards for the first time last night cutting carrots. When i went to clean it saw how much damage my knife did to the board, also it is now permanently stained by the carrots. These problems are the very reason i was replacing my 10 yr old cutting board from Pampered chef. I guess i will go back to that brand because this Gorilla Cutting Board is not good at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie L. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: NOT non-slip cutting boards!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these *specifically* because I wanted cutting boards that do not slip. The 'Gorilla Grips' on each end have no effect whatsoever to keep the boards from moving. And because the surface of them is much smoother than the plastic cutting boards that I have, they are almost MORE slippery. I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable
customer_reviews.text: Great boards but cut Mark's are visible and might collect bacteria
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: 3 boards - one price
customer_reviews.text: I have used these cutting boards for about a week now. They are okay. Just that. Knife work is not as easy on these as on other boards, I suspect that it's because the board really doesn't give. These are fine for quick slicing, but if you are planning to chop or mince, you will probably be better off with a different board
customer_reviews.author: dawnro

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional cutting board set
customer_reviews.text: This cutting board set more than compliments the strength and durability of the Gorilla brand. Different jobs in the kitchen require different tools. No less is the case when it comes to cutting boards. Rather than having one large or small cutting board for all your kitchen projects this "set" provides the flexibility to choose the right board for your needs. They are very study and made of hard material. Easy to clean, dishwasher safe and they look good too. I highly recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: VMor50

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend and he uses it everyday. We recently held a White Elephant Christmas party at his house and that was when I finally got to use it and everything about it was great especially the hooves, that was AMAZING!! I did NOT have to worry about the food spilling onto the counters. The cutting boards we used before did not have any hooves. Overall, they’re beautiful, nicely made, and I can’t wait to buy my own set!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chhan

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Like this set, easy to grab off the shelf with handles, groove around edges allows juice from vegetables/fruits from getting on the counter. It is a bit smaller than the set I had. The black handles take away from the size. I have used the large board many times and it seems to be holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Marvolous

customer_reviews.title: Great housewarming gift
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. They stack well, and will fit just about anywhere in your kitchen. These are quite sturdy, and clean super easy. In the past I've had problems with knife cuts or discoloration of a cutting board, this has not been a problem with these. Would make a great housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Tuttle

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: So when I saw "gorilla grip" I thought they would be super grippy but they really aren't. I still like them but they aren't what I was expecting. They are easy to clean and I like the different sizes. So if you need 3 cutting boards then I would get them but don't buy them if you are worried about them slipping.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart B.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly sized, heavily balanced (not flimsy) non-porous with a smooth surface cutting boards . Comes clean with simple wash. Much better quality than one board that I purchased from a major big box store at the same price point as these 3 boards. My previous board was not as good a quality as these new cutting boards in terms of weight and non-porous surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: D Moore

customer_reviews.title: Anti-slippery? No
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it described as anti slippery with a special rubber. Totally not.
customer_reviews.author: Feifei Ji

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for 2 wedding gifts so I haven't tried them myself. I ordered because of recommendations by several friends. I know my nieces and there new husbands will enjoy them. I'm planning to get myself a set too.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: This gorilla has lost his grip.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for their supposed non-slip characteristics. The rubber gripping is minimal, which is logical since there is just a small strip of rubber at the ends. Very disappointing. Otherwise, they seem like typical plastic cutting boards. The smaller board is the least stable. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. B

customer_reviews.title: Great, with one glitch
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice boards, truly dishwasher safe, nice weight, great size selection. Others have noted here that they don't tend to grip the counter as advertised. Let me be more specific: The boards are reversible and have a juice channel on just one side (which in my mind is an advantage). However, with the juice channel side up, the rubber borders don't extend below the white cutting surface far enough to fully grip the counter., so they slide aroud a bit. But with the juice channel down, they grip great. I just wish the rubber borders were a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey A. Zink, Ph.D. (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: Scratches after first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of its high number of reviews. Two things wrong: 1. It doesn't grip my granite countertop well. Dont know why it is called Gorilla grip! 2. After first use, I have knife scratches all over the place. Same as any other cutting board I've own. Very dissapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: New and seems great
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Came fast and packaged well. The rubber grips on the bottom help and the channel around the sides has been deep enough. Haven’t used it enough to comment on scoring but that’s why I bought the three pack. One for meat. One for fruit. one for veg. Will update if anything goes bad
customer_reviews.author: P Do

customer_reviews.title: Love these cutting boards
customer_reviews.text: I got these to upgrade from my cheap cutting boards from college. These are perfect for everyday use and super sturdy. I love the different sizes so you bring the small one out for cutting lemons or limes and the large ones for full meals such as meat. These are also super easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Pretty decent price for a set of three cutting boards. Cons: Quickly show signs of wear after minimal use. The 'grippy' edges are hardly grippy and barley hold a clean dry surface let alone one with any amount of liquid on it. They will probably end up in the trash due to damage from regular use within 3-4 months from my purchase date. My last non-wood cutting board lasted years.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Catface

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! Gorilla Grip what exactly? They slide all over the place...smoother than my 800ct bed sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Chickenlady38

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well sized
customer_reviews.text: This pack has exactly what I'm looking for. I specifically wanted the larger board so the price for all three was attractive. They are thicker than my other boards with a juice groove, and I have already put them to work. The largest one is wider than most, and is a great size for chopping a lot of onions. If you have someone just starting their kitchen these would be a great practical gift.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Porter

product_meta.title: Gorilla Grip Original Oversized Cutting Board, 3 Piece, BPA Free, Dishwasher Safe, Juice Grooves, Larger Thicker Boards, Easy Grip Handle, Non Porous, Extra Large, Kitchen, Set of 3, Black
feature_bullets: NOT ALL CUTTING BOARDS ARE CREATED EQUAL!! Our professional quality cutting boards and cheese servers are both strong and durable to help ensure that they remain in place on most smooth and clean surfaces.

MUCH LARGER AND THICKER: Our cutting boards have been designed to satisfy even the most demanding chef needs! The set of three comes with: a large 16'' x 11.2'', a medium 13.8'' x 9.6'' and a small 11.8'' x 8'' size. They are thicker and larger than most other cutting boards and contain deep grooves to catch juices so your countertop stays clean.
CLEAN and SAFE: The boards are dishwasher Safe and BPA Free. Plus, they're non-porous (unlike wood/Bamboo), so they won't splinter, crack or peel. No oiling or maintenance necessary!
WON'T DULL OR HARM KNIVES: Our cutting boards are a great choice for chopping vegetables and meats and serving cheese.
GUARANTEE: No Questions Asked Return Policy. Guaranteed to Hold Gripping Properties for 10 years.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,167 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: GORILLA GRIP Original Reversible Cutting Board
